channel.title: In need of MAJOR help! Please just look!
channel.description:
Ok when I try to start my computer (other one) it says something like "no *something* found. press any key to restart." So I press a key and it says "System error: system halted"
What can I do? I can't let my parents find out (they'll make me pay for it :()!

item.title: In need of MAJOR help! Please just look!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Thanks guys, but I’ll try the win repair. Mopar, how do I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: In need of MAJOR help! Please just look!
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

You can Install windows without using a new partition but the it would be messed up, since there would be something like 2 of everything or something like that, on your HD. If you reformat, you’ll lose all your crap and if your parents have an account, your owned =(

BTW What’d you do to your comp? Been naughty lately? And if You had to like get a new computer to owe your parents or something, get your own build, it’s not that hard, if you build your own you could be saving like $200-$XXXX dollars… I suggest cracking open your case right now, and learn the components

Read full topic

item.title: In need of MAJOR help! Please just look!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Why does it matter if your parents find out?

Anyways, try starting up in safe mode by tapping f8 as soon as you turn on your computer.

To get to BIOS, on one of the screens you press Delete.

Read full topic

item.title: In need of MAJOR help! Please just look!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Uhh I can’t say exactly (parents are home and I don’t want them to see this) sorry. But something like SMFGD (i know it’s 5 setters all capital) cannot be found. Press any key to restart. I press a key “System failure (i think) boot failed.” That’s all.

Oh where do I go to get to BIOS?[br][size=1]Posted at: June 15, 2006, 01:59:48 pm[/size][hr]Well my parents are home, but they haven’t found out yet. Come on guys I REALLY need help

Read full topic
